jcr:root.jcr:title: You can cancel your subscription at any time before the start of the next billing period. Billing is monthly, quarterly, or half yearly, depending on the frequency you choose.
jcr:root.jcr:title.en: You can cancel your subscription at any time before the start of the next billing period. Billing is monthly, quarterly, or half yearly, depending on the frequency you choose.
jcr:root.jcr:title.fr: Vous pouvez annuler votre abonnement à tout moment avant le début de la prochaine période de facturation. La facturation est mensuelle, trimestrielle ou semestrielle, selon la fréquence choisie.
